itemLabel: Bernard Taylor, Baron Taylor of Mansfield

wikipedia_page.main: Harry Bernard Taylor, Baron Taylor of Mansfield, CBE, JP (18 September 1895 – 11 April 1991) was a British coalminer and politician who was a Labour Party Member of Parliament (MP) for 25 years. He was then a member of the House of Lords for a further 25 years.

response: * Bernard Taylor, Baron Taylor of Mansfield (1895–1991), British coalminer and politician, Labour Party MP
